EmailTemplate.name: 202002_APAC_Tradeshow_Singapore-Airshow_amr.Email Invitation- with image
EmailTemplate.subject: Schedule a meeting and receive a complimentary pass for the Singapore Airshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You Are Invited To the Singapore Airshow 2020 Please join us... Honeywell Aerospace is excited once again to attend the Singapore Airshow.
Our leadership team would like to meet with valued customers like you. They welcome the opportunity to discuss industry trends, development and production programs, as well as relevant technology collaboration.
Please provide a convenient date and time to coordinate a meeting by contacting your local sales team or one of our event staff:
Irene.loh@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Irene.loh@Honeywell.com]]>
Amy.xu2@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Amy.xu2@honeywell.com]]>
Shamoon.Shabudin@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Shamoon.Shabudin@Honeywell.com]]>
We look forward to seeing you in there. DATE Feb 11-14, 2020 TIME 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. GMT+8 LOCATION Honeywell Booth:
Chalet CS32
